page.title: 01A PREFACE
page.content: The area of our survey is a rural landscape, basically comprising of two main communities the villages of{Roxby and{Appleby.}The rest scattered with isolated farm houses and the small hamlet of{High and Low Risby. The farming workforce is now very small and only a small percentage are employed on the local farms. The majority of residents travelling to nearby towns and further a field for their employment. The{amenities}for the area are very few. The advent of the motor car has led to a reduction in bus services and shops. Now the two communities have niether a post office or school. The land is mostly under cultivation for cereals, peas, beans, sugar beet, oil seed rape and straw_ berries.{Mining susidence}from disused iron-ore mines has proved a problem in th 80's with areas now fenced off.
